name: Date Martinez
description: A rich, layered twist on a classic cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces amontillado dry sherry, such as Lustau

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass 2/3 with ice, then pour in sherry, gin and date molasses. Add the dashes of Peychaud’s and stir 20 seconds to chill. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist orange peel over top of drink to release oils and garnish drink with peel.
